title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 497.2 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 497.2 - Definition

State Regulations

For the purpose of this section residence shall mean
living in the prescribed area with intent to make it a fixed and permanent home
and consequently to be physically and readily available in the event of a
natural disaster or civil defense emergency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
497.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
